summary: The film starts in the trip from Sevilla to Linares, where Manolete stops in Córdoba to see his mother. He will be remembering some passages of his life.
cast: Adrien Brody|Penélope Cruz|Santiago Segura|Juan Echanove|Ann Mitchell|Josep Linuesa|Nacho Aldeguer|Pedro Casablanc|Enrique Arce|Tomás Pozzi|Jorge Cabezas|Xavier Martinez|Berta de la Dehesa|Natalia Moreno|Pablo Calvo|Antonio de la Fuente|Luis Hostalot|Sergio Otegui|Vicente Garrido|Francisco Díaz|Pepe Ocio|Dritan Biba|Javier Mejía|Denise Moreno|Jason Fernandez|Antonio Guti|Javier Bernal|Fernando Bermejo|Óscar de la Casa|Iñaki García|Alberto Martín|Xabier Murua|Omar Muñoz|Quique|Juan Rueda|Rubén Tobías
title: Manolete
